SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.CommunicationProtocol.RMI.ServerRemoteInterfaces

Interface ClientHandlerRemoteInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientHandlerRMI
public interface ClientHandlerRemoteInterface extends Remote
The RMIClientHandlerConnection interface defines the remote methods that can be invoked on the client handler by each client for handling communication with the server.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    handShake()
    The client calls this method to signal that they are ready to interact with the client handler.
    The client handler when this method is called attempts to establish the connection in the other direction (Server -> Client) completing the handshake.
    void
    ping()
    Used by the client to ping the client handler, indicating that it (the client) is still connected.
    This method is used as an implementation of a heartbeat mechanism.
    void
    sendCSP(ClientServerPacket packet)
    Sends a ClientServerPacket from the client handler to the server.

  • Method Details

    • sendCSP

      void sendCSP(ClientServerPacket packet) throws RemoteException
      Sends a ClientServerPacket from the client handler to the server.
      Parameters:
      packet - The ClientServerPacket to send to the server.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related exception occurs during the remote method invocation.

    • handShake

      void handShake() throws RemoteException
      The client calls this method to signal that they are ready to interact with the client handler.
      The client handler when this method is called attempts to establish the connection in the other direction (Server -> Client) completing the handshake.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related exception occurs during the remote method invocation.

    • ping

      void ping() throws RemoteException
      Used by the client to ping the client handler, indicating that it (the client) is still connected.
      This method is used as an implementation of a heartbeat mechanism.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related exception occurs during the remote method invocation.
